name: StocksGuru
0:
”Alexa, open stocks guru”
”Alexa, ask stocks guru Is stock exchange open?”
”Alexa, ask stocks guru about market index”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stocks guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stocks Guru, an Alexa skill, makes it easier to find and track stock prices of companies that interest you. Typical finance websites assumes that you have financial background and you are reasonably comfortable with stock tickers, earnings, graphs etc. However, if you want a simple and straight forward way to keep track of stock prices relevant to you without the upsell of stories, blogs, podcasts or analysis, this skill is for you.


To learn more, please visit this link 
 https://bitbucket.org/ak-org/alexaskillsdocs/src/master/Stocks-Guru-About.md 


 The user manual and helpful guide is available at 
 https://bitbucket.org/ak-org/alexaskillsdocs/src/master/Stocks-Guru-Help.md
